text:
Created attachment 34328
proposed graph for Latency vs TPS vs Virtual Users

When I prepair metrics for our performance results I like to combine the two metrics which my management can relate to and understand e.g. TPS (Transactions per second) and Latency.

I would like to see a combination grap for latency, transactions per second and VU's (virtual users).

Please see an example graph attached....
creator: anthony@donuts.email
